markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orichalcum Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2802)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=683" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2919)

</column>

---

Orichalcum armor can be etched with four magic property runes instead of three due to the magical empowerment of orichalcum. If you’re wearing armor made of orichalcum, the armor grants you insights into the future, granting you a +1 circumstance bonus to [initiative](/Rules.aspx?ID=835) rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>
Orichalcum Armor (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 556 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 55,000 gp (+5,500 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The initial raw materials must include orichalcum worth at least 27,500 gp + 2,750 gp per Bulk.
name: Orichalcum Armor
